articles.description: All the latest football news and transfer updates as clubs continue their preparations for the new Premier League season, plus all the latest gossip.
articles.title: Football live: Transfer news including updates on Onana, Calafiori and De Bruyne

articles.description: Two-time gold medallist Andy Murray will retire after the Olympics in Paris.
articles.title: Andy Murray to retire from tennis after 2024 Paris Olympics

articles.description: In the space of a month in 2012, Andy Murray went from tears in the rain to gold in the sunshine, winning hearts and medals on Centre Court.
articles.title: Andy Murray, Wimbledon & the Olympics - four weeks that changed it all

articles.description: Manchester City manager Pep Guardiola says influential midfielder Kevin de Bruyne will stay at the club.
articles.title: Man City: Pep Guardiola says Kevin de Bruyne will not leave

articles.description: Paris 2024 promises to halve the carbon footprint of London 2012 and Rio 2016. How will it happen and what challenges must be tackled?
articles.title: Paris 2024: Will it be most sustainable Olympic Games ever?

articles.description: The top European leagues and players' union Fifpro will launch legal action against world governing body Fifa over its "abuse of dominance".
articles.title: Fifa: European leagues & Fifpro take legal action over 'abuse of dominance'

articles.description: Snoop Dogg will carry the Olympic torch through the Paris suburb of Saint-Denis before Friday's opening ceremony.
articles.title: Olympics 2024: Snoop Dogg to carry torch ahead of opening ceremony

articles.description: BBC Sport looks at the stars, rivalries and key events to watch when the athletics gets under way at the Paris 2024 Olympic Games.
articles.title: Paris 2024: Athletics stars, rivalries and key events to watch at Olympic Games

articles.description: Arsenal manager Mikel Arteta says the club are trying to strengthen "certain positions" as they close in on the signing of Italy defender Riccardo Calafiori.
articles.title: Riccardo Calafiori: Arsenal near deal for Italian defender with Mikel Arteta looking to strengthen

articles.description: LeBron James scores 20 points for the United States as they beat Germany 92-88 in their final warm-up game before the Olympics.
articles.title: LeBron James inspires USA to win against Germany in final Olympics warm-up game
